attributes.action: Increase the maximum discount applied to the 'Right to Buy Scheme'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Everybody knows that the price of housing has risen dramatically above inflation over the past ten years.  

However the maximum discount applied to council homes has not risen in proportion.  

A discount which was once a large portion of the house value under conservative government is now reduced to a pittance.

The cap on the discount needs raising so that the discount will once again make the right to buy an affordable way to get onto the property ladder.
